ABOUT

Who Am I?

I Am Arjay Federio. I Am 23 years old. I have a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science major in Graphics and Visualization. I have no work experience right now but I was able to do my OJT (On-the-Job Training) at Frontline Business Solutions for more than 4 months as a Web Developer. I am an enthusiastic team player who enjoys collaborating with others to achieve common goals. I am a proactive and organized person, skilled at managing my time and prioritizing tasks efficiently. Lastly, I am a dedicated and hardworking individual who always strives for excellence.
